data.name: Warface — Weapon set "Sniper pack"
data.detailed_description:
About the "Sniper" set


A versatile set for every sniper aiming for immediate results. Strike opponents from the maximum distance without leaving your comfortable firing position. Victory is in the bag!



The set includes iconic guns that bring victory to their skillful owner no matter the circumstances.



The set includes two types of weapons: a pistol, which is suitable for any class in the game (except for the SED), and a rifle for the Sniper.

Desert Eagle


A pistol with good accuracy and high damage, suitable for almost all play styles. It is characterized by a high range and a good fire rate.

AWM

A sniper rifle with colossal damage, which is characterized by a high range and good accuracy.




After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

If you have received the Crown version of the Desert Eagle pistol, we will be replacing it with the regular one shortly. Sorry for the inconvenience.

data.short_description: The long-range sniper rifle and a powerful pistol are a gentleman's set of any self-respecting sniper. With it, you’ll truly become a messenger of death on the battlefield!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
